abstract: seaworthy flips its brunch special upside down .
article: brunchwire -- seaworthy is flipping the traditional brunch special on its head . rather than free drinks with the food , order a bottle of champagne and get two free brunch plates . peek the menu here . the chains -- the mad scientists at starbucks 's holiday drink lab buried deep beneath the city of seattle have released their latest sugary monster into the wild : the christmas tree latte . eventwire -- new orleans food and wine festival will present emeril lagasse with the ella brennan lifetime achievement award at a gala on january 25 , 2018 .

vip reception at 6 p. m. dinner at 7 p. m. tickets are $ 175 a pop and available here . santawire -- todd price reports that crawfish are coming in early this year , possibly int time for christmas . so , sometimes dreams really do come true . food tv -- for kids who want to compete on top chef junior , audition time is coming up this wednesday , december 13 from 12 p. m. to 7 p. m. at the ritz carlton in new orleans . profiles -- writer brett martin has a profile of nina compton in garden an gun that is well worth your time .
